lead_paragraph: The extraordinary punishment was announced on Friday by the sport’s governing body. The ultimate authority over the Games, the International Olympic Committee, will discuss the decision on Tuesday.

byline.contributor: Ivan Nechepurenko contributed reporting from Moscow.

headline.print_headline: Russia Barred  From Track  in Rio Games
headline.main: Russia’s Track and Field Team Barred From Rio Olympics

snippet: The extraordinary punishment was announced on Friday by the sport’s governing body. The ultimate authority over the Games, the International Olympic Committee, will discuss the decision on Tuesday.
